Search Advanced search in fields, lets search in any fields with standard method or regular expressions. ;Code and demo For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages * Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Search/ * Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Search "},"$:/plugins/kookma/search/results":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/search/results","created":"20220104182348949","modified":"20220106214108469","tags":"show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Search/Macro]] \define field-search(field) <$let regexpFilter = """[subfilterregexp:$field$]""" normalFilter = """[subfiltersearch:$field$:$(flag-list)$[$(search-terms)$]]""" searchFilter = {{{ [match[regexp]thenelse] }}} matches = {{{[subfiltercount[]]}}} resultformat = {{{ [get[format]] }}} tableCosl ={{{[get[text]]}}} pagingStat = {{{ [compare:integer:gt[25]then[yes]else[no]] }}} > <$list filter="""[subfilterlimit[1]]""" > $field$ (<$text text=<>/>) <$reveal default=<> type=match text='tabular'> <$macrocall $name=table-dynamic filter=<> fields=<> class="w-100" editButton="no" pagination=<> stateTiddler="advancedsearch/$field$" /> <$reveal default=<> type=nomatch text='tabular'> <$list filter=<> >
<$link/>
\end <$let field-list = {{{ [get[field]match[*any]then[*]] [get[field]] +[first[1]] :else[[*]] }}} casesensitive = {{{ [get[case-sensitive]] }}} search-mode = {{{ [get[search-mode]] :else[[words]]}}} flag-list = {{{ [] [] +[!is[blank]join[,]] }}} search-terms = {{{ [get[text]else[]] }}} filterMinLength = {{$:/config/Search/MinLength}} > <$list filter="[minlengthlimit[1]]" emptyMessage={{{ [!is[blank]then[Search term is too short]] }}} variable=ignore> <$reveal default=<> type=match text='*'>
